targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  alert_time, classification, alert_type, description, priority,
  src_ip, src_port, dst_ip, dst_port, protocol,
  router_mac, router_public_ip
FROM anomaly_alerts
WHERE alert_time::date = CURRENT_DATE;

SELECT mac_address, description, last_seen_online
FROM routers
WHERE mac_address IN ($router_ip)

SELECT local_ip_address, mac_address, if_blocked, last_seen_online
FROM devices
WHERE local_ip_address IN ($device_ip)

targets.query:
from(bucket: "network-data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "netflow")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "in_bytes" or r._field == "dst")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.dst =~ /^${device_ip:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["protocol"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, column: "in_bytes", createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with in_bytes: float(v: r.in_bytes) / 1024.0 / 1024.0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "protocol", "in_bytes"])

from(bucket: "network-data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "netflow")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "in_bytes" or r._field == "src")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.src =~ /^${device_ip:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["protocol"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, column: "in_bytes", createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with in_bytes: float(v: r.in_bytes) / 1024.0 / 1024.0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "protocol", "in_bytes"])

from(bucket: "network-data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "netflow")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "in_bytes" or r._field == "src" or r._field == "dst")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.src =~ /^${device_ip:regex}$/ or r.dst =~ /^${device_ip:regex}$/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with in_bytes: r.in_bytes / 1024 / 1024 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["in_bytes"])
  |> mean(column: "in_bytes")

from(bucket: "network-data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "netflow")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "in_packets" or r._field == "src" or r._field == "dst")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.src =~ /^${device_ip:regex}$/ or r.dst =~ /^${device_ip:regex}$/)
  |> keep(columns: ["in_packets"])
  |> mean(column: "in_packets")

from(bucket: "network-data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "netflow")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "in_bytes" or r._field == "src" or r._field == "dst")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.src =~ /^${device_ip:regex}$/ or r.dst =~ /^${device_ip:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["dst"])
  |> sum(column: "in_bytes")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with in_bytes: float(v: r.in_bytes) / 1024.0 / 1024.0 }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.in_bytes >= 0.01)
  |> group()

from(bucket: "network-data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "netflow")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "in_bytes" or r._field == "src" or r._field == "dst")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.src =~ /^${device_ip:regex}$/ or r.dst =~ /^${device_ip:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["src"])
  |> sum(column: "in_bytes")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with in_bytes: float(v: r.in_bytes) / 1024.0 / 1024.0 }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.in_bytes >= 0.01)
  |> group()

from(bucket: "network-data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "netflow")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "in_bytes" or r._field == "src" or r._field == "dst")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.src =~ /^${device_ip:regex}$/ or r.dst =~ /^${device_ip:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["dst", "src"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, column: "in_bytes", createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with in_bytes: float(v: r.in_bytes) / 1024.0 / 1024.0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "dst", "src", "in_bytes"])

from(bucket: "network-data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "netflow")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "in_packets" or r._field == "src" or r._field == "dst")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.src =~ /^${device_ip:regex}$/ or r.dst =~ /^${device_ip:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["dst", "src"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, column: "in_packets", createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "dst", "src", "in_packets"])

from(bucket: "network-data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "netflow")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "in_bytes" or r._field == "dst" or r._field == "src")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.src =~ /^${device_ip:regex}$/ or r.dst =~ /^${device_ip:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["dst"])
  |> sum(column: "in_bytes")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with in_bytes: r.in_bytes / 1024 / 1024 }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.in_bytes >= 0.001)
  |> group()

from(bucket: "network-data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "netflow")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "in_bytes" or r._field == "src" or r._field == "dst")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.src =~ /^${device_ip:regex}$/ or r.dst =~ /^${device_ip:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["src"])
  |> sum(column: "in_bytes")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with in_bytes: r.in_bytes / 1024 / 1024 }))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.in_bytes >= 1)
  |> group()

from(bucket: "network-data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "netflow")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "in_packets" or r._field == "dst" or r._field == "src")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.src =~ /^${device_ip:regex}$/ or r.dst =~ /^${device_ip:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["dst", "protocol"])
  |> sum(column: "in_packets")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.in_packets >= 1000)
  |> group()

from(bucket: "network-data")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "netflow")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "in_packets" or r._field == "src" or r._field == "dst")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.src =~ /^${device_ip:regex}$/ or r.dst =~ /^${device_ip:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["src", "protocol"])
  |> sum(column: "in_packets")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.in_packets >= 1000)
  |> group()

text.fixed: Last Time Updated Data for Devices
Last Time Updated Data for Routers

list.definition:
SELECT d.local_ip_address
FROM public.devices d
LEFT JOIN public.routers r ON d.router_id = r.id
WHERE r.mac_address IN ($router_ip)
list.label: The IP od the device
list.name: device_ip
list.query:
SELECT d.local_ip_address
FROM public.devices d
LEFT JOIN public.routers r ON d.router_id = r.id
WHERE r.mac_address IN ($router_ip)

list.definition:
from(bucket: "network-data")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "netflow")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "src" or r["_field"] == "dst")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> distinct(column: "_value")
list.description: Returnes actual for the moment public IP addresses
list.name: actual_ip_addresses

query.query:
from(bucket: "network-data")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "netflow")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "src" or r["_field"] == "dst")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
  |> distinct(column: "_value")
